summary: A man in a hat and camouflage shirt performs slow-motion experiments with liquids and a toy figure. In the first segment, he uses a stick to cause a glass of yellow liquid to splash. In the second segment, he creates a fountain effect with a toy Ultraman figure in a basin of water. In the third segment, he inflates a balloon filled with small colored balls and then pricks it with a pointed object, causing the contents to spray out.
